Bios.description: This is the schema definition for the BIOS attributes resource.
Bios.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BIOS attributes for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The Actions object contains the available custom actions on this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AttributeRegistry.description: The Resource ID of the Attribute Registry for the BIOS Attributes resource.
AttributeRegistry.longDescription: The reference to the Attribute Registry that lists the metadata describing the BIOS attribute settings in this resource.

Attributes.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific list of BIOS attributes.
Attributes.longDescription: BIOS Attribute settings appear as additional properties in this object, and can be looked up in the Attribute Registry by their AttributeName.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

ChangePassword.description: This action is used to change the BIOS passwords.
ChangePassword.longDescription: This action shall perform a change of the selected BIOS password.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetBios.description: This action is used to reset the BIOS attributes to default.
ResetBios.longDescription: This action shall perform a reset of the BIOS attributes to teir default values.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
